meanings.definition: A thick cloth or pad used to protect hands from hot dishes or pans.
meanings.sent1: I used a potholder to take the hot pan out of the oven.
meanings.sent2: Mom always grabs a potholder before taking out the freshly baked cookies.
meanings.sent3: The potholder felt like a cozy hug for my hands as I held the steaming pot.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a potholder, warming my heart on a cold day.
meanings.sent5: The bright red potholder with a cute design made cooking more fun.

meanings.definition: A device or tool used to grip hot pots or pans.
meanings.sent1: The silicone potholder had a good grip on the hot pot.
meanings.sent2: Dad reached for the potholder to lift the sizzling pan off the stove.
meanings.sent3: The chef's potholder had a mind of its own, dancing around the kitchen.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like a potholder, carefully handling the delicate situation.
meanings.sent5: The sturdy potholder saved the day when the pot slipped from her hands.
